```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(ggthemes)
```

```{r theme_tufte, cache = TRUE}
# with ticks and range frames
(ggplot(mtcars, aes(wt, mpg))
 + geom_point() + geom_rangeframe()
 + theme_tufte())
# with geom_rug
(ggplot(mtcars, aes(wt, mpg))
 + geom_point() + geom_rug()
 + theme_tufte(ticks=FALSE))
```
